author: perezhilton
title: Kristin Cavallari's Husband Jay Cutler Released From The Chicago Bears Where Will He Head Next?
text:
Looks like Kristin Cavallari might be saying goodbye to Chicago soon.
On Thursday, the Chicago Bears granted quarterback Jay Cutler 's request to be released from the team, which leaves him as a free agent, according to ESPN 's Adam Schefter .
This all comes as the Bears plan to bring on Mike Glennon as their starting QB. #Sports.
Related: Kristin Isn't Here For Body Shaming Trolls 
As for where the athlete will head next, sports analysts seem to think the New York Jets could be a front runner: 
For now, the list of teams with a potential interest in Jay Cutler starts with…the New York Jets.
— Adam Schefter (@AdamSchefter) March 9, 2017 

Been writing and talking about Jay Cutler to the Jets for quite some time. At the right price, they'd have interest. We'll see if it happens
— Jason La Canfora (@JasonLaCanfora) March 9, 2017 
Kristin's camp didn't have a comment on the situation at this time.
We'll keep you posted as we learn more !
[ Image via Instagram . ] 
Tags: business blitz , chicago , chicago bears , football , jay cutler , kristin cavallari , nfl , zportz
